EmailTemplate.description: Educate customer to inform connote deletion team
EmailTemplate.name: Manifest not sent
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Claim Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Consignment Note [...]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Name__c},
We refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber} for consignment note [...].
Please be advised a credit has been approved.
Moving forward, in order for any unnecessary charges to be applied to your account, an email can be sent to our Connote Deletion Team (connote.deletion@startrack.com.au) by 2 pm each Wednesday, in order for the charge to be removed prior to billing.
Kind regards,
Customer Resolutions Team StarTrack credit.claims@startrack.com.au {!Case.EmailThreadID__c}
{!$Label.Australia_Post_Email_Security_Disclaimer} {!$Label.Australia_Post_No_Email_Phishing_Statement}
